person.persName: John W. Clark (Eddyville, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster)

body.p: Eddyville, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster. Ohio native. Married to Lucy Ann Clark. Father of Elizabeth A. Clark. Postmaster in Eddyville from June 1858 to August 1861. Merchant in Eddyville in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 99; Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, Lyon County, Kentucky, p. 126, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
